fcmaes.astro.MessFull Class Reference fcmaes.astro.MessFull
Represents a specific type of 'messenger full' configuration.

Detailed Description
Represents a specific type of 'messenger full' configuration.
This class inherits from Astrofun and initializes parameters for the 'messenger full' subsystem. The parameters define operational ranges essential for the subsystem to function properly.

fcmaes.astro.MessFull.__init__ ( self)
Initializes an object of the messenger full class, inheriting from Astrofun.
The initialization sets up the parameters and properties specific for the `messenger full` configuration by invoking the parent class constructor with specific initialized values. The class defines ranges and bounds necessary for the system.
